pageTitle: Meatspace chat: your 2 seconds of fame.
poweredByDO: Powered by Digital Ocean! THEY ARE THE BEST.
contributorCopy: Sending a fix to the repo? (No new features please)
hackerCopy: New features/ideas/hacks that use the web version of the chat?
devsCopy: Want to do a third-party client/bot/whatever using the API?
termsAndConditions: Please read and accept the Terms and Conditions before continuing with Meatspace chat.
browserWarningString: Your browser is not letting you have the full Meatspace experience!
browserWarningSubtext: You will be able to see other peoples chats, but unable to post your own. Consider trying one of the browsers below, or continue on and just watch!
